title: How can I Change my server
body: Currently I'm on NA  but i get too many pings (250 to 280+) I want to change my server to EU West how can I do that?

replies.body: Transfers are currently on [cooldown ](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown)as we prepare for end of season rewards.  We expect to have it back up later this month!  In the meantime you can still create an account on that region if it helps.  Hang tight!
